name: Ahime Image Printer
author: Ahime

sections.description:
Ahime Image Printer is a tool dedicated to photographers. It will allow your customers to resize your photos according to certain ratio.

It has several features such as:

  • Resize image
  • Crop image
  • Change Image orientation (portrait or landscape)
  • Add unlimited image
  • Change image order quantity
  • Add resizes image to cart

Tested on wordpress version higher than 5, it is compatible with the different version of woocommerce.
The most stable version of the plugin is the first version 1.0.0

Arbitrary section

You may provide arbitrary sections, in the same format as the ones above. This may be of use for extremely complicated
plugins where more information needs to be conveyed that doesn’t fit into the categories of “description” or
“installation.” Arbitrary sections will be shown below the built-in sections outlined above.

A brief Markdown Example

Ordered list:

  1. Resize image
  2. Crop image
  3. Change Image orientation (portrait or landscape)
  4. Add unlimited image
  5. Change image order quantity
  6. Add resizes image to cart

Unordered list:

  • Resize image
  • Crop image
  • Change Image orientation (portrait or landscape)
  • Add unlimited image
  • Change image order quantity
  • Add resizes image to cart
sections.installation:
1. Upload ahime-image-printer to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Ahime > settings and define your personalization page
  4. Create a product
  5. Just below the price section you will see “Printing Image config”, select yes
sections.faq:
Can they change the output of the image?

Yes, this is possible on order.

What to do when you encounter an error?

Contact us, we will be happy to correct the problem quickly.
